charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0100_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] walked past the
entrance to a cave, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a loud
rumbling sound coming from inside.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0200_:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] entered the cave to investigate
the origin of the sound...
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1101_0300_:
Suddenly, a Palpitoad leapt onto the path 
from out of nowhere!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_0400_:
Well, hot diggity!
There ya are, Palpitoad!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_0500_:
And...is that you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
What in tarnation are you doin’ here, kid?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_0700_:
Well, we were just doin’ some diggin’
in this here cave.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_0900_:
Well, we were just doin’ some diggin’
in this here cave.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1000_:
That rumblin’ ya heard was probably ol’
Palpitoad here levelin’ the ground for me.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1100_:
But I reckon he got so excited, he couldn’t hold
it in no more—stumbled off down the path. 
I chased him all the way back here.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1200_:
But never mind all that hooey!
The point is, we need more muscle!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1300_:
You ’preciate the aesthetics o’ my diggin’,
don’tcha, kiddo? If ya do, maybe
ol’ Clay’ll put YOU to work!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1400_:
Answer me this... Ya got artificial tunnels
’n’ ya got natural rock tunnels, right?
Which kind do you reckon is easier to use, kid?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_1600_:
Well, bless your heart!
That’s correct!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_1800_:
Are you jus’ yankin’ my chain, kid?
Or do ya really like rough ’n’ tumble
adventurin’ that much?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_1900_:
I guarantee ya, caves ’n’ tunnels made
by people are far more convenient and
well maintained.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2000_:
Anyhoo, next question!
’Tween artificial tunnels ’n’ natural rock
tunnels, which do you reckon are prettier?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_2200_:
Well, toot my horn!
I feel the very same!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_2400_:
Well, good ol’ nature does have a kind o’
beauty ya can’t replicate artificially.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_2500_:
But what if ya try lookin’ at it from a
different perspective?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2600_:
I mean, folks say beauty’s in the
eye o’ the beholder, don’t they?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2700_:
I, myself, think artificial caves ’n’ tunnels
are the most beautiful of all!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2800_:
Why? ’Cause they help to improve the economy
in a lotta ways! Money’s important, kid.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_2900_:
We sacrifice our precious time to work
hard ’n’ improve our craft, then we get
compensation—money—in return for that labor.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3000_:
In my case, I’m providin’ convenience to my
consumers—the folks who use my tunnels—
in exchange for receivin’ that money.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3100_:
Folks use my tunnels like roads—
for transportin’ goods, travelin’ to visit friends...
All sorts o’ things!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3200_:
Convenience makes the consumers happy,
’n’ gettin’ paid makes me happy.
It’s a win-win situation for everybody!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3300_:
And in case you were wonderin’,
diggin’ tunnels is a joint effort between
me ’n’ my Palpitoad here.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3400_:
He’s got Bubble Beam ’n’ Bulldoze,
’n’ I got my pickax.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3500_:
Those tunnels are a product o’ the bond
between a Trainer and a Pokémon, see?
And havin’ that bond makes both of us happy.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_3600_:
Ain’t nothin’ in the world more beautiful
than that combination, if ya ask me!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0401_3800_:
That mighta been a li’l advanced for a
whippersnapper like yerself. But listen...
The PML’s gonna be tough as boulders.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_0402_4000_:
That mighta been a li’l advanced for a
whippersnapper like yerself. But listen...
The PML’s gonna be tough as boulders.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4100_:
You can try to drill right through it, but sooner
or later, yer gonna hit some hard bedrock.
All you got is you ’n’ yer Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4200_:
Y’all gotta work together to get through
that tough bedrock before you can build
yer pretty tunnel beyond!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4300_:
I hope I get to witness y’all do it.
I really do mean that.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4400_:
Well, anyhoo! I reckon you’ll do a fine job
o’ helpin’ me dig in this here cave!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2301_1201_4500_:
It’s gonna take a lotta strength to triumph at
the PML, right? Well, yer hard labor here’ll be
like special trainin’! It’s a win-win situation!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0100_:
I couldn’t help but notice...your Palpitoad
smells like fresh, nutrient-rich soil.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0200_:
Oh-ho! That’s one powerful sniffer ya got
there, missy! Palpitoad here just loves playin’
in the dirt. Y’all would be best buds!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0300_:
Pokémon that use Ground-type moves do well
in good, fresh soil... Would you do me the
honor of a battle, sir?
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_1201_0400_:
Why not?
Let’s see what y’all can do!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0101_0100_:
When Mudsdale and I are through with you,
you’ll know exactly what we’re capable of!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0101_0200_:
Hah! Y’all think ya can power through
Palpitoad’s mud?! I’d like to see ya try!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0100_:
Whew...
You weren’t kidding about Palpitoad’s mud.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0200_:
You and your Pokémon used some mighty
earth-shatterin’ moves yerselves there, missy!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0300_:
I’m pleased you noticed! You are as strong as
any island kahuna in my book.
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0400_:
Palpitoad?!
Hold up—are you evolvin’, buddy?!
charaepi_ch0033_00_yakon/2311_0501_0500_:
Well, I’ll be! That battle with you must’ve
woke somethin’ up inside of him!
